Feature Notes:
Arcane Tradition: 1 selection
Bladesong: Can use a bonus action to gain Bladesong features for 1 min 2 times per short rest; medium armor, heavy armor, or a shield negates
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of Egyptian-Ptah and fellow believers

Combat
Hit Points: 123 Initiative: 5 Armor Class: 10 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Light Weapon Proficiency: Dagger; Dart; Flail; Light Crossbow; Quarterstaff; Sling
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (+8 1d4+2 R20/60); Dart (+8 1d4+2 R20/60); Quarterstaff (+8 1d8+2); Unarmed (+8 1+2)
Combat Notes:
Alert: +5 Initiative
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Training In War And Song: Armor Proficiency (Light)/Weapon Proficiency (Choose 1 from any One-Handed)
Alert: Cannot be surprised, and unseen foes gain no advantage on attacks on self
Bladesong: +2 Armor Class during Bladesong
Great Weapon Master: Can use a bonus action to attack after scoring a critical hit or reducing a foe to 0 hit points with a melee weapon/Can make a -5 attack with a heavy weapon to inflict +10 damage
One With The Word: Upon taking damage when Manifest Mind is active, can use a reaction to negate the damage and remove 3d6 spell levels from Awakened Spellbook for 1d6 long rests once per long rest
Polearm Master: Can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of a polearm, inflicting 1d4 HP bludgeoning, and a foe entering polearm reach provokes an opportunity attack
Savage Attacker: Can take the best of two melee damage rolls once per rd
Song Of Defense: Can use a reaction and expend a spell slot during Bladesong to reduce damage to self by 5x the slot level
Song Of Victory: +2 HP melee weapon damage during Bladesong
Save Proficiency: Intelligence; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 4; Constitution: 2; Dexterity: 0; Intelligence: 8; Strength: 2; Wisdom: 7
Magic
Spell Slots: W0: 5; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 3; W4: 3; W5: 3; W6: 2; W7: 2; W8: 1; W9: 1 Attack: W: 8 Spell DC: W: 16
Spells:
Arcane Eye (W4 Divi): R30' Self sees with darkvision through a remote invisible eye that can move 30' per rd for concentration up to 1 hr
Banishment (W4 Abju): R60' Banishes the target to its home plane or a demiplane (save Charisma negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Charm Person (W1 Ench): R30' Target regards self as a friend (save Wisdom negates) for 1 hr or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Chromatic Orb (W1 Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 3d8 HP of a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Cone Of Cold (W5 Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (save Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Dimension Door (W4 Conj): Teleports self and 1 adjacent willing creature up to 500'
Disintegrate (W6 Tran): R60' Inflicts 10d6+40 HP force and turns the target to dust if reduced to 0 HP (save Dexterity negates), or disintegrates a Large or smaller object or magical force [+Level inflicts +3d6 HP]
Enlarge/Reduce (W2 Tran): R30' Target increases a size category, gaining advantage on Strength checks and +1d4 HP weapon damage, or decreases a size category, suffering disadvantage on Strength checks and -1d4 HP weapon damage (save Constitution negates), for concentration up to 1 min; can instead target an unattended object
Friends (W0 Ench): Self gains advantage on Charisma checks with a non-hostile target for concentration up to 1 min; the target becomes hostile afterward
Gaseous Form (W3 Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous, gaining a 10' fly Speed and advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saves, for concentration up to 1 hr
Geas (W5 Ench): R60' Target obeys self instructions (save Wisdom negates) for 30 days [+Level extends the duration to 1 yr or permanently at level 7 or 9]
Grease (W1 Conj): R60' 10' sq becomes difficult terrain and causes creatures to fall prone (save Dexterity negates) for 1 min
Invisibility (W2 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for concentration up to 1 hr; target attacking or casting ends [+Level affects +1 target]
Major Image (W3 Illu): R120' Creates a 20' cube sight, sound, and touch illusion (Investigation detects) for concentration up to 10 min [+Level extends the duration to permanent at level 6]
Maze (W8 Conj): R60' Sends the target to a labyrinthine demiplane (save DC 20 Intelligence escapes; minotaurs and goristro demons automatically succeed) for concentration up to 10 min
Mending (W0 Tran): Touch repairs a break or tear up to 1 ft
Mirror Image (W2 Illu): 3 duplicates (AC 10; damage destroys) allow misdirecting attacks on self for 1 min with an 11, 8, or 6 on a d20 while 1, 2, or 3 duplicates remain
Mordenkainen's Magnificent Mansion (W7 Conj): R300' Self and designated creatures can enter an extradimensional dwelling containing provisions for 100 people for 1 day
Otiluke's Freezing Sphere (W6 Evoc): R300' 60' radius inflicts 10d6 HP cold (save Constitution half) and freezes water for 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Phantom Steed (W3 Illu): R30' Conjures a mount that can be ridden by a designated creature 100' per rd (13 MPH) for 1 hr or until damaged [R]
Poison Spray (W0 Conj): R10' Inflicts 4d12 HP poison (save Constitution negates)
Prismatic Wall (W9 Abju): R60' 90'x30' area blinds within 20' for 1 min (save Constitution negates); creatures passing through suffer 10d6 HP each fire, acid, lightning, poison, and cold (save Dexterity half), restraint (save Dexterity negates) and petrification after 3 failed Constitution saves (3 successes negates), and blindness (save Dexterity negates) and banishment to another plane (save Wisdom negates)
Ray Of Sickness (W1 Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP poison and poisoned for 1 rd (save Constitution HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Seeming (W5 Illu): R30' Changes the appearance of targets (save Charisma negates; Investigation detects) for 8 hr
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning and loss of reactions until its next turn
Simulacrum (W7 Illu): Uses snow to create an obedient copy of a target creature with half its hit points
Magic Notes:
Arcane Recovery: Can recover 10 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest once per long rest
Awakened Spellbook: Held spellbook allows performing a ritual casting in the spell's normal casting time once per long rest, using the spellbook as a focus, and changing a spell's damage type when casting it
Bladesong: +2 Constitution to retain spell concentration during Bladesong
Cantrip Formulas: Can replace a W0 cantrip once per long rest
Manifest Mind: R300' Can use a bonus action to see with darkvision, hear, and cast spells 6 times through a ghostly object that emits 10' dim light and can move 30' per rd once per long rest; can spend spell slots for additional uses
Master Scrivener: R5' After a long rest, can create a scroll, usable only by self, for a 1-action, 1st or 2nd level spell from Awakened Spellbook; reading the scroll casts the spell at 1 level higher than normal/Wizardly Quill produces spell scrolls at 1/2 the normal time and cost
Signature Spells: Can cast 2 chosen W3 spells without spending a spell slot once per short rest
Spell Mastery: Can cast a chosen W1 spell and a chosen W2 spell at will and spend 8 hr to change the choices
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the wizard spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
War Caster: Has advantage on concentration saves to maintain a spell/Can cast when holding a shield or a weapon/Can use a reaction to cast as an opportunity attack in response to movement
Wizardly Quill: Can use a bonus action to create a quill that produces multicolored, erasable writing and copies spells at 2 min per level
Notes
